entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Marathon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:32 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Marathon Airport 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: SSW 13 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
